13.4. Case Study 2: Trend 237
 Seasonal Order: (1, 0, 1, 0)
 Trend Parameter: ‘t’ for linear trend
It is surprising that a conﬁguration with some seasonal elements resulted in the lowest error.
I would not have guessed at this conﬁguration and would have likely stuck with an ARIMA
model.
